item.title: Rizzle Kicks’ Jordan Stephens Makes Theater Debut With Queer Cult Classic ‘Entertaining Mr. Sloane’ at London’s Young Vic (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: Jordan Stephens is making the jump from music to theater, tapping into the Young Vic’s Main House for his stage debut in Joe Orton’s “Entertaining Mr. Sloane.” The Rizzle Kicks
